moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Domain Controller Hashdump
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module attempts to copy the NTDS.dit database from a live Domain Controller
        and then parse out all of the User Accounts. It saves all of the captured password
        hashes, including historical ones.
author: theLightCosine <theLightCosine@metasploit.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: TIMEOUT
options.description: Timeout for WMI command in seconds
